title: Ramona the Brave
description: Ramona Quimby can't wait to begin first grade! She'll finally be in the same grown-up school as her sister, Beezus.Though Ramona has high hopes, life in Mrs. Grigg's class is not what she thought it would be. On the very first day Ramona tells an exciting story for Show and Tell only to have the class laugh at her. Then, when a classmate is praised after copying Ramona's project for Parent' Night Ramona decides she's had it with school!Nothing is going the way she had planned. Can Ramona find the courage to go back to Room One?--back cover
author: Beverly Cleary
